questions.question: It's not just Jor-El's planet, it's a Kentucky town named for element 36
The first amicus curiae filed before the Supreme Court came in 1821 from this Kentucky attorney & congressman
From Kentucky, the hot brown is an open-faced turkey & bacon sandwich topped with this cheesy bechamel sauce
Meriwether Lewis Clark created the Kentucky Derby to replicate the derby at this "salt"y site in England
Controversial Texas state senator Wendy, controversial Kentucky county clerk Kim
Kentucky & Maryland, which both host legs of the Triple Crown, both have this as the state horse
choices: What is an American Quarter Horse

questions.question: In a Cameron Crowe movie, Orlando Bloom returns to this Kentucky place
This 6-word phrase about sticking together is Kentucky's state motto
choices: What is 'United we stand, divided we fall'
What is 'With God, all things are possible'
What is 'Ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem'
What is 'She flies with her own wings'

questions.question: 8 sweet rides at Kentucky's National Corvette Museum were almost lost to this
Kentucky's Cumberland Falls often feature this; a rainbow with light from a satellite, not a star
One genealogist estimates around 90% of Kentucky's 1790 population had arrived there via this road
Father to War Admiral, this horse who died in 1947 is buried under his statue at the Kentucky Horse Park
Mummified Indian remains have been found at this Kentucky national park
The Kentucky bourbon Old Tub was renamed this, for the man who rebuilt the family business after prohibition
choices: What is Old Rip Van Winkle

questions.question: Half of a deadly feud, this family lived primarily in Kentucky; their rivals, in West Virginia

answers.chatter: Cowboy up. You’ll have winning thoroughbred success in no time.
Well done. You’re on the Kentucky Derby trail.
Congratulations. You deserve Kentucky Colonel honors.
